channel.title: My Projects on Vinn Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in My Projects on Vinn Nguyen

item.title: Tool Design
item.description: During the spring semester of my freshman year, I enrolled in Tool Design. [aka 2.S02; one of the successors to the beloved and now discontinued 2.00B :pensive:] I wanted to get a taste of what mechanical engineering looks like and Tool Design I thought was (now I truly believe) the best class to do so. As my first “real” project-based mechanical engineering course at MIT, the work we did stayed true to the title of the course; we built tools
